description: Try our easy to follow Berry Donut Shortcakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Berry Donut Shortcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine strawberries, raspberries, blueberries and 3 tsp icing sugar in a bowl. Set aside for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, reserve 1 tsp icing sugar. Whip cream with vanilla and remaining icing sugar until thick. Fit a piping bag with a star nozzle and fill with cream.
Split donuts in half through the centre. Pipe cream onto bases, then top with some berries and donut top. Finish with cream and dust with reserved icing sugar. Serve with remaining berries.
